thread.title: CPC expels media exec over UK 'green card' (Beijing Municipal Government)
thread.title_full: CPC expels media exec over UK 'green card' (Beijing Municipal Government) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: CPC expels media exec over UK 'green card' (Beijing Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Beijing Municipal Government ) A State newspaper manager has been found to have permanent residence in the United Kingdom along with his family, violating China's regulation that official media management are not allowed to obtain
